Worldwide , highly populated countries are experiencing an imbalance between the supply and demand of water,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'I', 'O', 'B']","['highly populated countries', 'highly populated', 'populated countries', 'worldwide', 'water', 'highly', 'populated', 'countries', 'experiencing', 'imbalance']",['populated'],"['populated countries', 'supply', 'imbalance', 'demand', 'water']","['populated countries', 'imbalance', 'supply', 'demand', 'water']","['demand', 'supply', 'water', 'imbalance', 'populated countries']","['populated countries', 'imbalance', 'supply', 'demand', 'water']","['demand', 'supply', 'water', 'imbalance', 'populated countries']"

India is one such example which has only 4 % of the world ' s water resources and a population of more than 1,"['B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['water resources', 'india', 'example', 'world', 'water', 'resources', 'population']",['such example'],"['water resources', 'such example', 'world', '%', 'more', 'population', 'india']","['water resources', 'such example', 'world', '%', 'population', 'india']","['water resources', 'world', 'population', 'india']","['such example', 'water resources', 'india', '%', 'world', 'population']","['water resources', 'world', 'population', 'india']"

Its water demand is expected to rise by more than 75 % in the upcoming decades due to fast population growth and expansion of irrigated agriculture , industrialisation and urbanisation,"['O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B']","['fast population growth', 'water demand', 'upcoming decades', 'fast population', 'population growth', 'irrigated agriculture', 'urbanisation', 'water', 'demand', 'expected']","['water demand', 'population', 'upcoming']","['fast population growth', 'upcoming decades', 'expansion', 'water demand', '%', 'more', 'industrialisation', 'agriculture', 'urbanisation']","['fast population growth', 'upcoming decades', 'water demand', 'expansion', '%', 'agriculture', 'industrialisation', 'urbanisation']","['industrialisation', 'agriculture', 'fast population growth', 'expansion', 'urbanisation', 'upcoming decades', 'water demand']","['fast population growth', 'water demand', 'upcoming decades', '%', 'expansion', 'agriculture', 'industrialisation', 'urbanisation']","['industrialisation', 'agriculture', 'fast population growth', 'expansion', 'urbanisation', 'upcoming decades', 'water demand']"

The consequences of this increased demand are already visible such as water quality deterioration near urban centres , water table lowering in the North - Western region , and seawater intrusion in coastal areas due to aquifer over - exploitation,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'B']","['quality deterioration near', 'deterioration near urban', 'near urban centres', 'water quality deterioration', 'water table lowering', 'western region', 'increased demand', 'deterioration near', 'near urban', 'urban centres']","['water quality', 'visible such', 'water', 'urban']","['water quality deterioration', 'water table', 'urban centres', 'western region', 'visible such', 'coastal areas', 'seawater intrusion', 'north', 'demand', 'exploitation']","['water quality deterioration', 'water table', 'urban centres', 'western region', 'coastal areas', 'seawater intrusion', 'north', 'demand', 'exploitation', 'consequences']","['urban centres', 'western region', 'water table', 'seawater intrusion', 'north', 'water quality deterioration', 'coastal areas', 'demand', 'consequences', 'exploitation']","['water quality deterioration', 'water table', 'urban centres', 'western region', 'consequences', 'demand', 'seawater intrusion', 'coastal areas', 'north', 'exploitation']","['urban centres', 'western region', 'water table', 'seawater intrusion', 'north', 'water quality deterioration', 'coastal areas', 'demand', 'consequences', 'exploitation']"

The occurrence of erratic and unreliable rainfall in the past few years has further aggravated the situation,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['unreliable rainfall', 'situation', 'occurrence', 'erratic', 'unreliable', 'rainfall', 'past', 'years', 'aggravated']","['few', 'unreliable']","['past few years', 'unreliable rainfall', 'erratic', 'occurrence', 'situation']","['past few years', 'unreliable rainfall', 'occurrence', 'situation']","['erratic', 'unreliable rainfall', 'occurrence', 'situation']","['past few years', 'unreliable rainfall', 'occurrence', 'situation']","['erratic', 'unreliable rainfall', 'occurrence', 'situation']"

In such a scenario , information on groundwater - surface water ( GW - SW ) interaction processes is helpful for the conservation and management of water resources,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'B', 'I']","['water resources', 'interaction processes', 'surface water', 'resources', 'water', 'scenario', 'information', 'groundwater', 'surface', 'interaction']","['surface water', 'interaction processes', 'water']","['surface water', 'water resources', 'interaction processes', 'helpful', 'gw', 'sw', 'conservation', 'groundwater', 'management', 'information']","['surface water', 'water resources', 'interaction processes', 'sw', 'information', 'gw', 'groundwater', 'conservation', 'scenario', 'management']","['surface water', 'groundwater', 'information', 'management', 'helpful', 'interaction processes', 'scenario', 'conservation', 'water resources']","['surface water', 'water resources', 'interaction processes', 'gw', 'sw', 'groundwater', 'scenario', 'information', 'conservation', 'management']","['surface water', 'groundwater', 'information', 'management', 'conservation', 'helpful', 'interaction processes', 'scenario']"

Therefore , this study thoroughly reviews the interaction phenomenon occurring in Indian waters,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['indian waters', 'study thoroughly reviews', 'interaction phenomenon occurring', 'study thoroughly', 'thoroughly reviews', 'interaction phenomenon', 'phenomenon occurring', 'indian', 'waters', 'study']",['interaction'],"['indian waters', 'interaction phenomenon', 'study']","['interaction phenomenon', 'indian waters', 'study']","['interaction phenomenon', 'indian waters', 'study']","['interaction phenomenon', 'indian waters', 'study']","['interaction phenomenon', 'indian waters', 'study']"

It covers the interaction in natural and artificially - constructed environments , methods for exchange flux quantification , conceptual applications , and challenges in accomplishing these investigations,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['exchange flux quantification', 'constructed environments', 'exchange flux', 'flux quantification', 'conceptual applications', 'investigations', 'covers', 'interaction', 'natural', 'artificially']","['conceptual applications', 'flux']","['exchange flux quantification', 'conceptual applications', 'methods', 'environments', 'challenges', 'natural', 'interaction', 'investigations']","['exchange flux quantification', 'conceptual applications', 'environments', 'methods', 'challenges', 'interaction', 'investigations']","['exchange flux quantification', 'methods', 'conceptual applications', 'environments', 'natural', 'challenges', 'interaction', 'investigations']","['exchange flux quantification', 'conceptual applications', 'environments', 'methods', 'interaction', 'challenges', 'investigations']","['exchange flux quantification', 'methods', 'conceptual applications', 'environments', 'natural', 'challenges', 'interaction', 'investigations']"

Rivers / streams , canals or seawater were considered as SW components in the majority of the studies , with the main focus on the Ganga River basin in the case of river - aquifer systems,"['B', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'I', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'B', 'O']","['ganga river basin', 'ganga river', 'aquifer systems', 'river basin', 'main focus', 'river', 'ganga', 'systems', 'streams', 'canals']","['main focus', 'sw components', 'river']","['ganga river basin', 'sw components', 'main focus', 'river', 'aquifer systems', 'case', 'seawater', 'studies', 'majority', 'canals']","['ganga river basin', 'main focus', 'sw components', 'river', 'aquifer systems', 'case', 'studies', 'seawater', 'majority', 'streams']","['rivers', 'streams', 'canals', 'case', 'seawater', 'aquifer systems', 'sw components', 'majority', 'main focus', 'studies']","['sw components', 'rivers', 'ganga river basin', 'streams', 'seawater', 'canals', 'main focus', 'majority', 'river', 'studies']","['rivers', 'canals', 'streams', 'seawater', 'case', 'sw components', 'majority', 'studies', 'main focus', 'aquifer systems']"

However , most of the investigations were site - specific without providing a generalised perspective , and in many cases , the interaction was not considered in totality,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['generalised perspective', 'totality', 'investigations', 'site', 'specific', 'providing', 'generalised', 'perspective', 'cases', 'interaction']","['generalised perspective', 'many']","['generalised perspective', 'many cases', 'specific', 'interaction', 'site', 'investigations', 'totality', 'most']","['generalised perspective', 'site', 'many cases', 'investigations', 'interaction', 'totality']","['site', 'specific', 'investigations', 'generalised perspective', 'interaction', 'totality']","['generalised perspective', 'many cases', 'investigations', 'site', 'interaction', 'totality']","['site', 'specific', 'investigations', 'generalised perspective', 'interaction', 'totality']"

Also , certain critical sites have not received the attention of the scientific and research community,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['certain critical sites', 'research community', 'certain critical', 'critical sites', 'community', 'certain', 'critical', 'sites', 'received', 'attention']","['critical', 'research']","['certain critical sites', 'research community', 'attention', 'scientific']","['certain critical sites', 'attention', 'research community']","['scientific', 'research community', 'attention', 'certain critical sites']","['certain critical sites', 'attention', 'research community']","['scientific', 'research community', 'attention', 'certain critical sites']"

These are dam reservoirs and wetlands in the Himalayas , eco - sensitive areas in North - Eastern India , submarine GW discharge sites at islands , and desertic and karstic terrains,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['eastern india', 'karstic terrains', 'dam reservoirs', 'sensitive areas', 'discharge sites', 'himalayas', 'north', 'eastern', 'india', 'terrains']","['gw discharge', 'dam reservoirs', 'sensitive']","['submarine gw discharge sites', 'eastern india', 'sensitive areas', 'karstic terrains', 'dam reservoirs', 'north', 'eco', 'islands', 'himalayas', 'desertic']","['submarine gw discharge sites', 'eastern india', 'sensitive areas', 'karstic terrains', 'dam reservoirs', 'north', 'eco', 'islands', 'himalayas', 'wetlands']","['sensitive areas', 'submarine gw discharge sites', 'eastern india', 'north', 'eco', 'himalayas', 'islands', 'wetlands', 'desertic', 'dam reservoirs']","['dam reservoirs', 'sensitive areas', 'eastern india', 'eco', 'himalayas', 'wetlands', 'north', 'karstic terrains', 'islands']","['sensitive areas', 'submarine gw discharge sites', 'eastern india', 'north', 'eco', 'himalayas', 'islands', 'wetlands', 'desertic', 'dam reservoirs']"

On a regional scale , very few research articles are available for India ' s Western and Central regions,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['central regions', 'regional scale', 'research articles', 'india', 'western', 'central', 'regions', 'regional', 'scale', 'research']","['regional scale', 'research']","['few research articles', 'regional scale', 'central regions', 'available', 'india', 'western']","['few research articles', 'central regions', 'regional scale', 'india']","['india', 'regional scale', 'western', 'available', 'central regions']","['few research articles', 'regional scale', 'central regions', 'india']","['regional scale', 'india', 'western', 'available']"

Accordingly , all such regions need to be explored in the upcoming studies,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['upcoming studies', 'regions need', 'accordingly', 'studies', 'regions', 'need', 'explored', 'upcoming']",['such'],"['upcoming studies', 'such regions']","['such regions', 'upcoming studies']",['upcoming studies'],"['such regions', 'upcoming studies']",['upcoming studies']

In the context of flux quantification methodology , modern techniques like geophysical methods and fully coupled numerical models were used fewer times than conventional techniques such as isotopic , hydrochemical and hydrological analyses,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['flux quantification methodology', 'like geophysical methods', 'fully coupled numerical', 'coupled numerical models', 'modern techniques like', 'techniques like geophysical', 'hydrological analyses', 'flux quantification', 'like geophysical', 'geophysical methods']","['geophysical methods', 'techniques', 'quantification', 'numerical']","['conventional techniques such', 'modern techniques', 'flux quantification methodology', 'geophysical methods', 'numerical models', 'fewer times', 'hydrological analyses', 'hydrochemical', 'isotopic', 'context']","['modern techniques', 'conventional techniques', 'flux quantification methodology', 'geophysical methods', 'numerical models', 'fewer times', 'hydrological analyses', 'context']","['modern techniques', 'flux quantification methodology', 'hydrochemical', 'geophysical methods', 'isotopic', 'numerical models', 'hydrological analyses', 'fewer times', 'context']","['flux quantification methodology', 'modern techniques', 'conventional techniques', 'geophysical methods', 'numerical models', 'fewer times', 'context', 'hydrological analyses']","['modern techniques', 'flux quantification methodology', 'hydrochemical', 'geophysical methods', 'isotopic', 'numerical models', 'hydrological analyses', 'fewer times', 'context']"

Therefore , extensive data collection and modern methods are recommended to study complex systems and obtain more accurate information,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['extensive data collection', 'study complex systems', 'accurate information', 'extensive data', 'data collection', 'modern methods', 'study complex', 'complex systems', 'information', 'extensive']","['data', 'modern']","['extensive data collection', 'complex systems', 'modern methods', 'accurate information']","['complex systems', 'extensive data collection', 'modern methods', 'accurate information']","['modern methods', 'extensive data collection', 'complex systems', 'accurate information']","['extensive data collection', 'modern methods', 'complex systems', 'accurate information']","['modern methods', 'extensive data collection', 'complex systems', 'accurate information']"

Further , the government sector seems reluctant to recognise this concept since , in various reports , complete information is unavailable for the interaction mechanism , and only some aspects of the phenomenon have been considered,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O']","['government sector', 'complete information', 'interaction mechanism', 'considered', 'government', 'sector', 'reluctant', 'recognise', 'concept', 'reports']","['various reports', 'government sector']","['interaction mechanism', 'various reports', 'complete information', 'government sector', 'concept', 'unavailable', 'reluctant', 'aspects', 'phenomenon']","['complete information', 'interaction mechanism', 'various reports', 'government sector', 'concept', 'aspects', 'phenomenon']","['unavailable', 'complete information', 'reluctant', 'interaction mechanism', 'government sector', 'aspects', 'concept', 'phenomenon']","['various reports', 'government sector', 'complete information', 'interaction mechanism', 'concept', 'aspects', 'phenomenon']","['unavailable', 'complete information', 'reluctant', 'interaction mechanism', 'government sector', 'aspects', 'concept', 'phenomenon']"

Additionally , there are anomalies in the GW recharge estimation from non - rainfall sources,"['O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'O', 'B', 'O']","['rainfall sources', 'recharge estimation', 'additionally', 'sources', 'anomalies', 'recharge', 'estimation', 'non', 'rainfall']",['rainfall'],"['rainfall sources', 'non', 'estimation', 'gw', 'anomalies']","['rainfall sources', 'gw', 'estimation', 'anomalies']","['non', 'estimation', 'rainfall sources', 'anomalies']","['rainfall sources', 'gw', 'estimation', 'anomalies']","['non', 'estimation', 'rainfall sources', 'anomalies']"
